description: People have been using cannabis for medicinal as well as misusing it for recreational purposes for thousands of years. Read more at straitstimes.com.
title: 'Synthetic cannabis': A new front in the war against drugs
title_page: 'Synthetic cannabis': A new front in the war against drugs | The Straits Times
maintext:
People have been using cannabis for medicinal as well as misusing it for recreational purposes for thousands of years.
The chemical responsible for the mind-altering effects of naturally cultivated cannabis is tetrahydrocannabinol (THC), and abuse can lead to adverse physical or psychological effects.
